doc.field: New-York Historical Society collection of albums
New-York Historical Society collection of albums

Metropolitan Hospital, Department of Hospitals, City of New York. On Welfare Island (Old Blackwell's Island) in East River (1894-1937). Wards Island (1875-1894) was its predecessor. / Arranged in this album, August 1937. Property of Frederick M. Dearborn

Metropolitan Hospital, Department of Hospitals, City of New York. On Welfare Island (Old Blackwell's Island) in East River (1894-1937). Wards Island (1875-1894) was its predecessor. / Arranged in this album, August 1937. Property of Frederick M. Dearborn
228 illustrations covering period from October 1875 to February 1937; views of hospitals, including interiors and staff.
